mapper.select: SELECT friend_type.type_name, friend.friend_id, friend_type.id AS type_id, u.avatar, u.sign, CASE WHEN friend.remark ='' THEN u.nick_name WHEN friend.remark IS NULL THEN u.nick_name WHEN friend.remark = 'null' THEN u.nick_name ELSE friend.remark END AS nick_name FROM friend_type left JOIN friend ON friend.type_id = friend_type.id left JOIN t_user u ON friend.friend_id = u.id WHERE friend_type.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY friend_type.build_time ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO friend_type ( type_name, user_id, build_time, is_default ) VALUES (#{typeName},#{userId},CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,#{isDefault})
mapper.select: select id,type_name,user_id,is_default from friend_type where id = #{id}
mapper.update: update friend_type set type_name = #{typeName} where id = #{id}
